name: French Tarot
descriptionTag: Play French Tarot online and have lots of fun with 3 to 5 players!

instructions.text:
For a description of the game, please refer to John McLeod's wonderful web site on card games: https://www.pagat.com/tarot/frtarot.html

All the card artwork used in this implementation is due to B. P. Grimaud, France (1898) and available in the public domain: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Tarot_nouveau_-_Grimaud_-_1898

slam_announce_q: Would you like to announce a slam?
poignee_q: Would you like to declare a Poigneé?
poignee_0_sel_n: Select {{ n }} cards for a Single Poignée.
poignee_0_sel_1_more: Select 1 more card for a Single Poignée.
poignee_0_sel_n_more: Select {{ n }} more cards for a Single Poignée.
poignee_1_sel_1_more: Select 1 more card for a Double Poignée.
poignee_1_sel_n_more: Select {{ n }} more cards for a Double Poignée.
poignee_2_sel_1_more: Select 1 more card for a Triple Poignée.
poignee_2_sel_n_more: Select {{ n }} more cards for a Triple Poignée.
poignee_2_desel_n: Deselect {{ n }} cards for a Single Poignée.
poignee_3_desel_n: Deselect {{ n }} cards for a Double Poignée.
